and i don't want a free ski trip to the mountains either, I already know  
=
what it is, if I understood him correctly. sf
 
 
In a message dated 7/10/2=
010 5:56:08 P.M. Eastern Daylight Time,  
rasterer@... writes:

 
 
 =

Considering the attacks people continue to make against  me on here just 
=
for having a different opinion of people's results, I  think you will 
unde=
rstand why I will not post my name and address  here.

Try anyway though.  =
I don't know how your personal  beliefs here work, but 
others seem to get =
messages about people they've  never heard of, or places 
they've never see=
n.

I would also  suggest anyone who tries this experiment, to post your 
r=
esults on the  list here rather than sending them personally to me - so I w=
on't 
be  accused of losing any.



--- On Sat, 7/10/10,  SnowfireL@...=
,<SnowfireL@...>  wrote:


From:  SnowfireL@...<SnowfireL@...>=

Subject: Re:  [EVP-ITC] Experiment 20100710
To:  EVP-ITC@yahoogroupsTo: 
D=
ate: Saturday, July 10, 2010, 2:49  PM


 
What is your name RJ? and where =
do you live?  There are  probably tons of 
RJ's in this world, and if i am =
going to ask any of  my guides if they want 
to play this game with you, I =
will not ask them  to run around the world a 
lookin for you. sf
 
 
In a m=
essage dated 7/10/2010 3:32:51 P.M. Eastern Daylight Time,  
rasterer@yahoo=
. com writes:

 

I have placed a little something on top of my computer  m=
onitor, right in 
front of me. It is now 7/10/2010. I will leave it  there =
4 days, and remove 
it Noon Denver time, on Wednesday,  7/14/2010.

All you=
 have to do is ask your boxes/spirits/  aliens/etc, what it is.

I have tak=
en a picture of it, and  posted it to the files section here, so 
there is =
no way I can squirm  out of the results:

_http://tech. groups.yahoo. com/g=
roup/  EVP-ITC/files/ RJ/RJ.20100710. 
1.zip_ (http://tech.groups.yahoo.com=
/group/EVP-ITC/files/RJ/RJ.20100710.1.zip) 

Please do not try to  open the=
 file before noon Wednesday. But feel free to 
download it to  your compute=
r beforehand, so you can be sure I won't change 
it  during, or after, the =
test.

Answers anyone reveals after noon  Wednesday don't count. Partial an=
swers 
(like just the color, or  shape, or some emotion vibe) don't count. =
Just tell 
me what it  is.

Best of Luck. I hope for this to be a regularly=
 occurring  experiment, and 
I hope we all can learn from the results.  


=










--part1_e9fd9.10548b37.396a4c9f_boundary
